pageContent: With Men's Health Week running from 10 to 16 June this year, there is an increasing focus on men's health. Prostate cancer may be traditionally associated with elderly men, but with improvements in screening techniques increasing numbers of patients are being diagnosed at a younger age, perhaps changing the view of this disease.

metaData.source:
Overview of Prostate Cancer Genetic Testing
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34210484/
